name: Forehead
description: The forehead represents wisdom, intelligence, and strategic thinking.

name: Eyebrows
description: Eyebrows indicate emotional control, motivation, and leadership potential.

name: Eyes
description: The eyes reflect insight, perception, communication, and emotional nature.

name: Nose
description: The nose symbolizes wealth, ambition, career energy, and social status.

name: Mouth
description: The mouth reveals communication skills, desire, and personal expression.

name: Chin
description: The chin reflects willpower, determination, and resilience.
